TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 讓開發人員僅覆寫 區域中 或伺服器控制項之選取區段的呈現。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of controls in an zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chrome 的週邊使用者介面 (UI) 項目參考該區域中包含的每個 Web 組件控制項或伺服器控制項的範圍內。Chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each Web Parts control or server control contained in a zone. 控制項的 chrome 包括框線、 標題列，和圖示、 標題文字和出現在標題列的動詞命令功能表。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. 色彩的外觀會在區域層級設定，並套用至區域中的所有控制項。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the controls in the zone. Web 組件控制集用法類別來呈現的 chrome控制項。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，這個類別會提供方法讓開發人員可以自訂的任何轉譯中的控制項區域。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any controls in an zone. 例如，您可以覆寫方法來自訂一些特定的樣式屬性定義在區域。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes defined in the zone. 類別包含數個重要的方法很有用，當您想要覆寫呈現控制項。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 其中一個是建構函式，您可以使用當您覆寫中的自訂方法類別來建立自訂的執行個體物件。One is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一個有用的方法是方法，可用來控制 （而不是 chrome 項目，例如頁首、 頁尾和標題列） 區域中控制項的內容區域的呈現。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 最後，如果您想要完整控制以程式設計方式轉譯的所有層面控制項，您可以覆寫方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來覆寫的預設轉譯中的控制項區域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in an zone. 在程式碼範例有三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 在範例中的所有控制項都裝載的網頁。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 類別，其中包含自訂的原始程式碼類別和區域。A class that contains the source code for a custom class and zone. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於此程式碼範例正常運作，您需要取得使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 在 Web 組件頁面上的變更顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在此程式碼範例中的.aspx 頁面與相同的資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the example is the Web page. 請注意，沒有`Register`指示詞靠近頂端的 要註冊的已編譯的元件和標記前置詞的檔案。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 也請注意頁面參考使用的項目自訂編輯器區域``。Also note that the page references the custom editor zone using the element ``. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分包含自訂編輯器的組件色彩和編輯器的組件區域的實作。The third part of the example contains the implementation of the custom editor part chrome and editor part zone. `MyEditorZone` 擴充且會覆寫一部分 chrome 傳回自訂編輯器。`MyEditorZone` extends and overrides to return the custom editor part chrome. `MyEditorPartChrome` 變更編輯器的組件控制項中的背景色彩方法。`MyEditorPartChrome` changes the background color of the editor part control in the method. 在 變更區域的背景色彩方法，以及文字編輯器中，組件加入方法。The background color of the zone is changed in the method, and text is added to the editor part in the method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.para: 如果您繼承自類別，您必須建立自訂區域，以傳回您自訂類別。此類別概觀中的範例 > 一節示範如何建立自訂區域，以傳回自訂類別

If you inherit from the class, you must create a customized zone to return your customized class. The Example section of this class overview demonstrates how to create a customized zone to return a customized class

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化 類別的新執行個體。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要供區域中其方法來建立的執行個體處理 chrome 轉譯和任何自訂轉譯物件區域中的控制項。It is used primarily by an zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone.

span.span: The that refers to is .

summary.span: 建立樣式物件，該樣式物件為 物件呈現的每一個 控制項提供樣式屬性。

span.span: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each control rendered by the object.
A that contains style attributes for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，以供物件來呈現控制項。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render an control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以變更編輯器的組件控制項的背景色彩。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor part control. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，包括網頁來裝載這些控制項，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#3)]

is not a .

span.para: 如果您繼承自類別，您可以選擇性地覆寫方法，而您想要新增的基底方法，以自訂樣式的樣式資訊屬性的合併。如需示範，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

If you inherit from the class, you can optionally override the method, and merge the style information from the base method with custom style attributes that you want to add. For a demonstration, see the Example section.

abstract member PerformPreRender : unit -> unit override this.PerformPreRender : unit -> unit

summary.span: 執行必須在呈現 控制項之前完成的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您執行必須在期間完成的工作事件和呈現控制項，例如套用至控制項的樣式表時，無法執行。The method allows you to perform tasks that must be done during the event and cannot be done when the control is rendered, such as applying a style sheet to a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以變更編輯器區域的背景色彩。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor zone. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，包括網頁來裝載這些控制項，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 呈現完整的 控制項及其所有區段。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現完整控制，使用標頭、 內容和頁尾。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 覆寫開發人員完成轉譯的所有層面的以程式設計方式控制這個方法提供`editorPart`; 基於這個理由，覆寫這個方法是相當複雜。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `editorPart`; for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.

span.span: The control that refers to is .

summary.span: 呈現 控制項的主要內容區域，但不包括區域首尾。

span.span: Renders the main content area of an control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您覆寫的主體區域呈現`editorPart`，同時讓轉譯頁首和頁尾的預設轉譯。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `editorPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法將文字新增至編輯器的組件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add text to the editor part. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，包括網頁來裝載這些控制項，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#5)]

span.para: 您可以選擇性地覆寫方法。因此，您可以只執行任何轉譯自訂項目，如果要，然後呼叫其方法。
You can optionally override the method. If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As EditorZoneBase

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的參考包含之控制項的區域物件所提供的轉譯。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering.
